title: Climate Change 202X: Impacts, Adaptation and Vulnerability
subtitle: IPCC Seventh Assessment Report - Working Group II Contribution
author: Intergovernmental Panel on Climate Change (IPCC)
description: The IPCC Seventh Assessment Report Working Group II contribution provides the most comprehensive and authoritative assessment of climate change impacts, adaptation, and vulnerability. This report synthesizes the latest scientific understanding of how climate change affects natural and human systems, evaluates current adaptation efforts, and identifies pathways for building climate resilience. Essential reading for policymakers, researchers, and practitioners working on climate change responses.
back_cover_text: Climate Change 202X represents the definitive scientific assessment of climate impacts and adaptation options. Drawing on thousands of scientific studies and expert review, this report provides critical insights for understanding and responding to climate risks across all regions and sectors. The Working Group II contribution examines observed and projected impacts, assesses adaptation progress and options, and evaluates responses to losses and damages from climate change.
